title: AlperBertan
author: AlperBertan
content: I made a big mistake depositing money on chips.ggthey stole the profit of all my bets.. my profit is only $900 ..what kinda bookie it is ? a bookie that even steals 900$Even though my bets are all major leagues, my account is banned by chips.ggI can't post screenshots of my bets because my account is lockedbe careful guys , please!https://imgur.com/sQBQAiQ

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: It's always recommend to use the basic report for scam accusations:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=260073.0Meanwhile, have you tried to contact their customer service and see what is reason you're banned? have you followed their "TOS" ? NOOB question...maybe you've done something wrong (like cheating, multiple accounts ...)? If you think you have been scammed, create a complaint with "Ask Gamblers" https://www.askgamblers.com/submit-complaintit has been suggested also by them in another scam accusations...

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: AlperBertan on January 10, 2023, 11:07:15 AMI made a big mistake depositing money on chips.ggthey stole the profit of all my bets.. my profit is only $900 ..what kinda bookie it is ? a bookie that even steals 900$They stole only your profit, not your deposit along with it that you were unable to withdraw?If you are banned, a gambling site would state the reason for the ban. What is the reason they stated? Like having multiple accounts, your country is restricted or not obeying one of the rules of the gambling site.You can post your complain on their ann thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5277365.0

comments.author: BarmyBasket
comments.body: Welcome to our family. They stole $13k from me using a similar scam from chipsggMy thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5427453.0A casino where you will be accused of abusing if you win. Never play in @chipsgg

comments.author: AlperBertan
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on January 10, 2023, 11:30:52 AMQuote from: AlperBertan on January 10, 2023, 11:07:15 AMI made a big mistake depositing money on chips.ggthey stole the profit of all my bets.. my profit is only $900 ..what kinda bookie it is ? a bookie that even steals 900$They stole only your profit, not your deposit along with it that you were unable to withdraw?If you are banned, a gambling site would state the reason for the ban. What is the reason they stated? Like having multiple accounts, your country is restricted or not obeying one of the rules of the gambling site.You can post your complain on their ann thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5277365.0they told me that I Was abusing .. as you know this is scammer bookie lie ... so they are banned me with out reason..

NOOB question...maybe you've done something wrong (like cheating, multiple accounts ...)? If you think you have been scammed, create a complaint with "Ask Gamblers" https://www.askgamblers.com/submit-complaintit has been suggested also by them in another scam accusations...Yeah , I did ... When they could notÂ  find a reason, they said it was abuse.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Over and over there's many users are complain to chips.gg, I know this casino was trusted, but I don't gamble in this casino since they're become inactive in this forum. But I believe since they already respond your complaint and said you're abuse the casino, it mean you've done something wrong.I really tired to see a complaint that blame the casino while the gambler is an abuser and trying to get benefit over it, this make hard to distinguish between innocent gambler and cheater/fraudster.

comments.author: BarmyBasket
comments.body: Quote from: Plaguedeath on January 10, 2023, 02:46:06 PMOver and over there's many users are complain to chips.gg, I know this casino was trusted, but I don't gamble in this casino since they're become inactive in this forum. But I believe since they already respond your complaint and said you're abuse the casino, it mean you've done something wrong.I really tired to see a complaint that blame the casino while the gambler is an abuser and trying to get benefit over it, this make hard to distinguish between innocent gambler and cheater/fraudster.They accuse me of abusing chipsgg for taking WorldCup and NBA bets. I even provided proof that the same bets were paid from 3 different casinos. You have abused our casino with these bets with the answers.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: OP, did you take screenshots of your conversation with their customer support? If you did, please post them here so we can understand what they are accusing of exactly. You said they accused you of abusing their games, but what kind of abuse are they talking about?I don't know how a gambler can cheat if he bets only on major leagues, as per BarmyBasket's claims (word cup and NBA) ! I suppose your story is similar to him, right?

comments.author: BarmyBasket
comments.body: scam 1 =https://i.imgur.com/r4gTYKb.pngScam2 =https://i.imgur.com/dUEVDPP.pngScam 3 = https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5433739.0They confiscate their money in the same way to every winning player. If you win, they claim that you are abusing, they ban you from live support and they don't respond to your emails.Never play in @Chipsgg
